title: DDI study group schema
description: JSON-schema representing an study group in the DDI model. A collection of entities known as study subjects based on a set of specified criteria and rules; synonyms: population, cohort.

name.description: a property to specify the name of the study group

size.description: a property to specify the number of members in the group

member.description: a property to list references entities of type material make up a group

selectionCriteria.description: a property to list the attributes of material and the values those should meet in order to be part of the group
